summary: The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.
cast: Audrey Hepburn|Peter O'Toole|Eli Wallach|Hugh Griffith|Charles Boyer|Fernand Gravey|Marcel Dalio|Jacques Marin|Moustache|Roger Tréville|Edward Malin|Bert Bertram|Georg Stanford Brown|Louise Chevalier|Rémy Longa|Jacques Ramade|Olga Valéry
title: Cómo robar un millón y...
